reported earlier this month that 55-year-old Kelsey Grammer and Kayte, 29, are planning to marry on February 25, with their reception expected to take place at New York's Plaza Hotel. A source said: Kelsey Grammer and Kayte have booked the Plaza ballroom for the reception. Despite the lavish surroundings, they want an intimate wedding with less than 150 guests. Kayte has laid out all the details, all the timings. The room will be decorated all in white, including a white cake. There will be a very tight guest list, and they won't allow cameras in.
